subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: More stuff on Clearscript
msgSnippet: Why not use the Quikscript forums at http://www.shavian.org/hugh/ikonboard/ikonboard.cgi Hugh B ... From: C. Paige Gabhart To: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
messageBody:
Why not use the Quikscript forums at http://www.shavian.org/hugh/ikonboard/ikonboard.cgi
 
Hugh B
----- Original Message -----
From: C. Paige Gabhart
To: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, July 15, 2003 5:27 PM
Subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: More stuff on Clearscript

Chuck:

This would work for those with scanners, but my understanding is that this would eat up a lot of hard disk space.  A couple of years ago, there was a Shavian site on Ikonboard.com.  The Shavian site It went belly-up in May, 2001.  I'm not sure why.  Anyway, I was thinking of something more like that, but I don't know anything about setting up such a site.  Ikonboard is still around.  Anybody out there know how to go about this?

Paige G.

Chuck Peck wrote:

 Several paople and my self have sent snail-mail
letters back and forth. It's realy interesting to read
someone else's writing.

Maybe we would use this fourm. We could write a
passage and then scan it in and post it as a picture
file. That might work.

Chuck

--- "C. Paige Gabhart" <pgabhart@...> wrote:
> Chuck:
>
> I think you've hit on a valid point.  I have read
> posts by people who seem to think there is a problem
> with QS's design because they find it tough
> going to build up their reading speed.  I think they
> are failing to take into account how much time they
> have spent in their life reading TO.  Even
> when we don't intend to read, we are surrounded
> constantly by advertising and end up reading it.
>
> If we want to gain reading speed in QS, we have to
> read QS a lot.  Your method of rereading several
> day's journal entries sounds excellent to me.  Of
> course it would be even better to read other
> people's QS.  Is there anyone here on the list that
> could help up us set up a place to write back and
> forth in QS?
>
> Paige Gabhart
>
 

__________________________________
